Articles.Content:
I don't what that means, but I'll go with false.

The user below is a renegade time-traveller who whenever somebody asks why he sounds like he's from the north says lots of planets have a north, and travels around in a big blue phone booth.

NO. NO. NO.

The user below me has a migraine.

Ouch. Why?

The user below me thinks that the dancing Mudkips above are bizarre but oddly appealing in some way or another.

No in some ways. They arent bizzare they are AWESOME AND ETERNAL. But are oddly appealing...

The user below me ate yam in his life.

I doupt, nope.

The user below me think Jar Jar Binks is an abomination.

Eh... No?

The user below me dances with monkey in tiny hats. and monocles

Edited June 1, 2014 by Anister

Close.

The user below me uses iFunny.

What is that? Nope.

The user below me hates banana.

No, on the contrary, mon cher, I find them quite delicious.

The user below me think pineapple is a stupid name and they should be named "ananas".

Edited June 2, 2014 by mrrpamplemousse

i m 100,01% aggree

the user below may not understand why when you know Kakashi Hatake and UchIHa you need some paper for the kING

True. I do not understand.

The user below me has kissed a girl and liked it.

I bet I WOULD like it... Forever alone

The user below me uses iFunny.

false it may appear but he is alone too

the user below me uses Yfunni

yWhat? :-/

The user below me does not eat giraffe for supper.

normally not, i would like to try however

The user below me never visited Eloo.

True (Without Cheating)

The user below me Has played less than 2 years

nope i forgot to watch how the time pass and can't remind

the user below me is great

I'm not too bad.

The user below me likes to drink orange juice after brushing his teeth.

False, only masochists like that.

The user below me saw 2001: A Space Odyssey and enjoyed it.

The user below me saw 2001: A Space Odyssey and enjoyed it.

True. Best space-related movie ever!

The user below me does not have a Steam Account.

False. STEAM FOR EVERYONE! GO TO HELL WITH EA AND UBISOFT! VALVE FOR LIFE!

...

The user below me hates EA, because of their addon frenzy and because they are milking their buyers from cash.

True. They release games before they're finished and don't iron out bugs, as well as on-release DLC. Add it to the game, I don't know how we haven't boycotted the purchase of on-release DLC yet. And don't get me started on the all-awful FIFA.

The user below me frequently walks to and from their fridge.

False. I only access the fridge when I am hungry (4 times a day)

The user below me has heard or read about KSP.

False - I saw a video on youtube.

The user below me heard someone sing about KSP.

False. People do that?

The user below me has sworn while playing KSP.
